subject: Hockey, Ice
Labor and Jobs
Lockouts
Hurricane Sandy (2012)
lead_paragraph: Operation Hat Trick, a charity game to benefit families affected by Hurricane Sandy, was the main draw, but with Donald Fehr present, pregame questions turned to the stalled labor talks.
snippet: Operation Hat Trick, a charity game to benefit families affected by Hurricane Sandy, was the main draw, but with Donald Fehr present, pregame questions turned to the stalled labor talks.
